mapper.insert: INSERT INTO channel_streaming ( channel_id, channel_owner_id, streaming_password, start_at, end_at, is_private ) SELECT c.channel_id, c.owner_id, #{password}, NULL, NULL, #{isPrivate} FROM channel AS c WHERE owner_id = #{channelOwnerId}::UUID;

select.if:
SELECT streaming_id AS id, streaming_password AS password, start_at AS startAt, end_at AS endAt, is_private AS isPrivate, channel_id AS channelId, channel_owner_id AS channelOwnerId
FROM channel_streaming
WHERE channel_owner_id = #{value}::UUID AND end_at IS NULL

SELECT streaming_id AS id, streaming_password AS password, start_at AS startAt, end_at AS endAt, is_private AS isPrivate, channel_id AS channelId, channel_owner_id AS channelOwnerId
FROM channel_streaming
WHERE channel_id = #{value}::UUID AND start_at IS NOT NULL AND end_at IS NULL

update.if: UPDATE channel_streaming SET start_at = now() WHERE channel_owner_id = #{value}::UUID AND start_at IS NULL AND end_at IS NULL
UPDATE channel_streaming SET end_at = now() WHERE channel_owner_id = #{value}::UUID AND end_at IS NULL
